attributes.action: Make Bank Holidays a  full Public Holidays for all..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Is to make all bank holidays within the UK a public holidays, protected by law, thus making employees rights legally enforceable to these dates, and to prevent employers from forcing people to work on these dates, without sufficient notice, and no days in lieu given back to them
Please note that this right doesn't exist under current UK employment law.
